Enter your Post, a photo or other link:
Enter your Paid Post, a photo or other link, the Max No. of Paid Endorsers, Keyword for Interests and the sum Total Amount to spend on this Ad Post:
Input the Message ID of the Post to Endorse:
Input the Message ID of the Paid Post to Endorse:
You can find Accounts to follow by using the Search - Account Lookup or Search - By Keyword featrues of the Geode Social App. Just Click Follow.
NOTE: Unfollow only affects your Public Feed and does not change your Paid feeds.
NOTE: Blocking affects both your Public and Paid Feeds. Blocked Accounts will not show in either feeds.
NOTE: Unblocking affects both your Public and Paid Feeds. Unblocked Accounts can show in both feeds.
Don't forget to designate the number of Public and Paid Posts to show. The default is 1000. Click Submit to Save your changes.
You can Reply to your Posts or other Posts or Replys, BUT, you can't endorse your own posts.

Click the Thumbs Up button on the Paid Posts in your feed to get paid for reviewing and endorsing Ads.  Interest words of the Ad must match the interest words for your account in order to see them in your feed. Go to your user settings to change or update your interest words to see more ads.
Click (View) to open the statistical analysis form.
